website_summaries.verdict: The unlocked Asus ZenFone AR puts Google Tango in an accessible form factor with solid hardware, but the AR experience still feels unpolished, and the price is high for what you get.

customer_reviews.title: Phone started vibrating and will not stop.
customer_reviews.text: I received the phone on Thursday, Activated a new sim on Friday and set the phone up how I liked it. Proceeded to use it for about half a day on Saturday when it started vibrating in my pocket like i had a phone call. Power cycle did not reset it. Neither did safe mode or a hard/factory reset. I'm going to guess its a hardware issue with the device and according to a couple other reviews I am not the only one with this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon R

customer_reviews.title: Faulty vibration motor
customer_reviews.text: Good device generally (camera not as good as my old LG G4) but more valuable for me due to the Tango depth sensor capabilities. As other users reported mine also started vibrating by itself. I discovered that if the phone is pressed with two fingers (index on screen and thumb near the bottom left corner of the camera plate) the vibration motor would start vibrating. It seems there's a faulty short there. When the phone is in the pocket, a slight bend (e.g. when you flex your leg) causes the phone to start vibrating. I'm returning it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: virtualHC

customer_reviews.title: decent phone, but asus can do better
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the phone when it came out, it ran great and smooth, but got very hot when using VR or AR. The battery was disappointing but thats to be expected from the specs. The leather finish on the back felt great and the phone looked good, but the bezels for a 2017 phone flagship leave a lot to be desired. The phone ended up getting purple burn in the top after a week or two so i sent it back. As a Asus fanboy I will look to their flagship next year hopefully we will see a winner but i would pass on this one, it just doesn't hit the mark. 8GB in a smartphone felt awesome though.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome features, not so good mats used for display.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone, because I was tired of having to close apps to use other apps. The 8GB RAM works like a charm. Sound quality: top notch. Battery, pretty good considering I play a lot of games on it. But the materials used for the display, are quite weak. My girlfriend and me bought the same phone, her phone fell once (even with the screen protector on) and the display went off. My 1st pf the two I bought got hit by a falling EMPTY can, on one side, the display died, and yes, it had the screen protector on too. Features: AWESOME! Mat. Quality: Not too good. Feels like and iPhone in that department.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great phone with cool factor
customer_reviews.text: Project Tango and Daydream in the same phone - whats not to like? Tends to heat up more than I am comfortable with during daydream sessions in particular but thats not too surprising. I am dissappointed that I cant tie the two technologies together yet from a developer perspective but this is no fault of the phone. Its amazing some of the things you can do with Tango - would strongly recommend the phone. I did replace the ZenUI launcher with the stock Android launcher though - don't know why there is a need for a custom skin over stock android - just gets in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Declan Tarrant

customer_reviews.title: Disapointing. Great specs but to fragile..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone because it has great specs and I wanted to try a new phone brand having never had an asus phone before. After setting it up the only problem I had using it was that I would go a day or 2 of not getting text messages and notifications from apps. Than about 2 weeks of having the phone I had it setting on a stool about 10 inches off the ground when it got knocked over and the display underneath the glass cracked in 3 places and became unresponsive... Really disappointed in this phone. Now Asus is another phone brand that I won't be buying from.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Asus Zenfone it's a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is AWESOME, I cannot find a single flaw in its design, operation, functionality. I highly recommend Asus Zenfones, they are cutting edge and very reliable and won't break the bank. The combination of Android and the ZenUI 5 OS is unbeatable, the camera is out of this world! Very fast, call quality is exceptional, no dropped calls, sound quality is equally impressive. Probably the best all around smartphone I have tested, used, and or owned.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Massei

customer_reviews.title: This is a monster of a cell phone!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my s5 took a carp. This has Wi-Fi hot spot working on it and I did not have to ask AT&T to turn it on or upgrade my plan. Camera is outstanding with this phone. Battery life is not that good, so for trips bring a battery bank. Love the memory card slot option, earphone jack and USB type C on it also. Solid damn phone no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: I recommended against buying this.
customer_reviews.text: hands down the worst phone I've ever had. From touch screen issues to the camera no longer working. Today I was listening to Audible and the phone decided to reset itself. Full-on factory reset with no user intervention. I will now be donating this to charity and going back to my Nexus 6.
customer_reviews.author: B. First

customer_reviews.title: Purple screen cornner
customer_reviews.text: Day after day each day expanding purple color I was thought is from the screen protector Today sense delivery day I couldn't feel good while Suppose buying a cellphone that has a huge technology Please I want explaining why me. Why the farest customer in the world Now please give me a solution
customer_reviews.author: Abdulmalik

customer_reviews.title: BLEEDING SCREEN
customer_reviews.text: PHONE IS GOOD AND PERFORMS WELL EXCEPT THE SCREEN MAY START BLEEDING. IT STARTS SMALL, BUT SPREAD AND WITHING 48 HOURS, THE ENTIRE SCREEN IS COVERED UP. THAT MAKES THE PHONE NON-FUNCTIONAL. QUESTION: THIS PHONE IS STILL UNDER THE WARRANTY PERIOD. BUT RETURN IS NOT SHOWING ON THE MENU. HOW CAN I RETURN THIS PHONE?
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this phone
customer_reviews.text: i buyed this phone on August and then, i dropped it since a foot tall then the screen get a blue spark that covered the whole screen so i buyed another screen to fixed,i had waiting for a month to fixed, after that the phone just worked for a two months more and the processor has been burned inexplicably. i had problems with the finger print and with the camera so i do not recommend this phone completely
customer_reviews.author: Edson Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Underrated phone.
customer_reviews.text: Despite you hear and read all the negativity and mediocre reviews online this is a great product. And yes ASUS may not be a top tiered manufacturer of mobile phones such as Apple and Samsung. It still a great and fast phone, I will defiantly try their product out again.
customer_reviews.author: Will L.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I wait for this phone over 6 months but very disappointed . The image Are really clear Freeze constanly and can freeze while making phone call so i cannot even hung up. Typing is nightmare, Tango or other crabs is useless since my screen freeze at any moment even during the call. 8 Gb to me it look useless since it freeze most the time. Writing bad review is not fun, but i have no choice.
customer_reviews.author: Hicham Mouchrik

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the worst mobile phones I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst mobile phones I've ever used, and none of them. The camera design flaws cause the camera module to be in poor contact. In the forum, I can see exactly the same faults as me. The blank screen presses the screen near the power button and the body shakes for no reason. Mainland China does not sell, can not be maintained, customer service attitude is rude.
customer_reviews.author: Yin Pengbo

customer_reviews.title: Has everything and more that you want in a phone.
customer_reviews.text: So I got this phone today and buy fare the best phone I have purchased its does everything it says it can do. I am a phone guy I love playing with new phones and trying them out so if you're looking for a new phone don't look anymore this is the phone for you and yes this phone is 10 times better then the IPhone x. This phone is definitely worth the money you get your money worth in tech in the phone. I am very pleased with the ASUS ZenFone AR and I know you will be to this phone gets a ten out of ten.
customer_reviews.author: Love1life1soul

customer_reviews.title: Vibration issues aside decent phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and specs however the Battery life while using heavy (surfing the web or on a plane watching shows and playing games nonstop) only got me about 7 hours. What killed me on it is that after time and if the phone overheats the screen will short out on the vibration motor meaning it vibrates for no reason and you can aggravate it by applying pressure to the screen near the power button. In all honesty I wish I would of held out for the ZenFone 4 pro, but you live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it! It has a screen problem, I had to change it twice in 4 month.
customer_reviews.author: Armin

customer_reviews.title: I've had Asus phones before that were great, but this phone is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I've had Asus phones before that were great, but this phone is horrible. Super slow, lags/freezes while doing simple task.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worse Signal ever
customer_reviews.text: Wherever you go there is no signal for internet, it can be at garage, basement or when you need a GPS. You can not count on it. A cheaper phone has a better signal.
customer_reviews.author: L. T.

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: The description was not correct. Does not work for the service it claimed it worked for. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: keath51p

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone has some nice features but when using Google VR it heats up quickly
customer_reviews.author: Samahu

customer_reviews.title: Best Cell I bought
customer_reviews.text: It arrives without the VR lens, but it has a protective package that was very usefull, i love the cell,
customer_reviews.author: Draco

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: dont buy, easy to bend and asus does not warranty this.
customer_reviews.author: kris s.

customer_reviews.title: Phone started vibrating and will not stop. Need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone started vibrating and will not stop. Need to send back for says to look at. I pay shipping, 7-10 business days for them to look at to resolve. Don't buy. Now, Google ArCore has killed tango hardware to boot. So I have defective hardware that is going nowhere now and it is not even a month old. Support is lacking, why should it take 2+ weeks to replace their defect6 phone?
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: ... waist high and is done the phone is a great phone but made way too cheap screen protector and ...
customer_reviews.text: screen is black fell from waist high and is done the phone is a great phone but made way too cheap screen protector and case will not save this screen from cracking on the inside
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, but Tango is NOT ready
customer_reviews.text: The Tango apps are NOT ready for prime time. They crash, have few functions and generally don't work. The phone gets very hot when you use any Tango app and they are quite a battery drain. After having the phone announced at CES 2017 and not ship until 8 months later, it is really sad how not ready the phone still was. I don't think that is is Asus' fault, I just think Google software was not ready. If you look, there are only 2 Tango phones, this one from Asus and one from Lenovo.
customer_reviews.author: SilentDoc

customer_reviews.title: well what now
customer_reviews.text: Dropped phone in case with screen protector on tile floor in a store no visible damage to screen or outer shell. sent in to ASUS for RMA there telling me the LCD is broken and I have to pay them 282.00 to fix it. would not recommend buying this device if you tend to drop things.
customer_reviews.author: sue ann rosati

customer_reviews.title: The ASUS ZenFone AR is a great phone with Google Tango feature
customer_reviews.text: There are some Tango apps that are just stunning. It is always nice to see my nevus playing with my phone while they fill the room with virtual toys. I got used to the room scanning app, but it is always fun to show it to someone to see this for the first time. It is a real eye opener for what is possible in the AR space. Despite Tango I am also a big fan of the case and the screen.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bell

customer_reviews.title: the phone starts shaking by it self for me it was a bad sperience.
customer_reviews.text: This product works and runs OK, but is to sensible I return this product one month ago and now I'm having problems with the new one again, less then 2 months, the phone starts shaking by it self for me it was a bad sperience.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme

customer_reviews.title: calling is pretty terrible. Now I literally can't even talk on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about a month now, calling is pretty terrible. Now I literally can't even talk on it. I can receive calls, can send calls, but as soon as the connection is established I lose my network and the call gets dropped. If the call doesn't get dropped I get bits and pieces from the other end but can't say anything back.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Orozco

customer_reviews.title: NOT ON VERIZON
customer_reviews.text: The phone is GREAT!!! However, VERIZON will not support it on their network.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will be honest I was a bit nervous about purchasing this phone because it didn't receive as high a score as I would have liked but I purchased it because every other ASUS product ...
customer_reviews.text: My normal practice, when purchasing high-tech toys, is to read the reviews. I will be honest I was a bit nervous about purchasing this phone because it didn't receive as high a score as I would have liked but I purchased it because every other ASUS product I own is outstanding in quality and performance. I think this is a great phone and it is better than Samsung's elite class of phones. Right now, I cannot find flaws, it's fast, the biometrics are fast, the build quality is high and it's stable. If you are searching for a new phone buy the Zenfone AR. You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: This phone is off the charts
customer_reviews.text: Made the switch to Asus and I never want to go back to my iPhone again! I have an Asus laptop as well, love their software and products! No lag, battery lasts all day, great looking screen, video and audio quality. Takes some of the best pictures I have ever seen! Would recommend to anyone looking for a new phone!
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: The phone is great, I usually panic about a new phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my second phone, the first had a defect in the phone itself. Amazon sent a new one immediately, didn't even go through my insurance. The phone is great , I usually panic about a new phone, but this one was very simple to get accustomed too. Photos are super !
customer_reviews.author: Dmye

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, screen defective
customer_reviews.text: The screen turned purple and then black, it died within 6 months. Not worth it! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn84olives

customer_reviews.title: construction defect.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 days of use the phone started vibrating and would not stop unless you hit the phone, then 5 minutes later the same thing would start over again, I always had good success with Asus, so maybe this is just a one time issue, but I wanted to make sure everyone is aware of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Afshin S Abadi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: One of the best performing phones I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M....

customer_reviews.title: Display is crisp. Phone is light. Speed is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I'm an ASUS fan. This phone is light, battery lasts long, the speed is great. The display is crisp: extremely clear. The camera are awesome. Picture quality for selfies as well as my general quick snap are clear and crisp like Ur looking directly at the object without the phone. I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Tika

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Received Verizon phone not unlocked. getting error to install Verizon sim card returning first thing in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but google assistant not working right and system ...
customer_reviews.text: Good phone but google assistant not working right and system fonts are way too small hard to see, lousy tech support
customer_reviews.author: American Star

product_meta.title: ASUS ZenFone AR 5.7-inch WQHD AMOLED 6GB RAM, 64GB storage LTE Unlocked Dual SIM Cell Phone, US Warranty (ZS571KL-S821-6G64G-BK)
product_meta.description: ZenFone AR is ASUS’s first 5.7-inch smartphone with Tango and Daydream by Google. Tango is an exciting new augmented reality (AR) technology that changes the way you interact with the world and expands your vision. And with Daydream, you can experience high-quality, immersive virtual reality (VR) with your phone when paired with the google Daydream View headset.
feature_bullets: 5.7-Inch Unlocked Dual SIM cell phone with super AMOLED display, 2560x1440 wqhd resolution
Tricam system with 23MP rear Camera, 4K video recording and 8MP front Camera.
Qualcomm S821. 6GB Onboard memory and 64GB storage with Micro SD card slot (expandable up to 2Tb), 3300 mAh non-removable battery with quick charge 3.0
Compatible with Google Tango Augmented Reality and Google Daydream Virtual Reality (*Daydream view is sold separately)
Compatible with GSM Networks including AT&T, T-Mobile and cellular network providers utilizing GSM network. This Device is not compatible with CDMA Networks such as: Verizon, Sprint, and US cellular

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars113 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Adaptor, User Manual, Warranty Card, Type C Cable, Earphone Headset
